name: Clarion Collection Hotel Havnekontoret
description: When you need to plan a get-together, choose the smoke-free Clarion Collection Hotel Havnekontoret in Bergen, NO near the Rosenkrantz Tower. Our pet-friendly hotel is also near the Bergen Aquarium, Haakons Hall medieval castle and Bergen Fish Market. Enjoy hotel amenities like free breakfast, an exercise room, a restaurant and a business center. All guest rooms have TVs, coffee makers, hair dryers and spacious work desks. Book now to connect with family, friends and colleagues. Children stay free if sharing a room with parents or grandparents if no extra bedding is required. Please note that all Choice Hotels in Scandinavia are non-smoking properties. Pet accommodations are available, please contact the hotel for more information.Choice Hotels

name: Moxy Bergen
description: Overlooking the sea, Moxy Bergen offers a sustainable hotel with an impeccable view in the Gateway to the Fjords of Norway. Moxy Hotels welcomes you to Bergen, a World Heritage City with unspoiled nature and picturesque outdoor life. Travel to Bergen in style with Moxy Hotels and enjoy a waterfront location in the business communities of Solheimsviken and Marineholmen. Enter your room keylessly, revel in abundant USB plugins, free WiFi, a 55 inch TV with Chromecast, gym access and designer bath amenities. Moxy is an energetic alternative to the typical hotel experience in Bergen, proving that choosing affordability does not mean sacrificing style and comfort. The Moxy Crew is ready to mix the drinks that you love, point you in the direction of places to visit in Bergen and give you insider advice on what you must see and do in Norways second largest city. What is more Moxy is your sustainable hotel choice in Bergen with leading sustainability certificates a perfect match for your eco travel goals.Marriott
